name: SensorAggregator
description:
Aggregate data from multiple sensors into a single stream
(often used as input to machine learning models on the same device, see model runner service).

contents.name: inputs
contents.description:
Set automatic input collection.
These settings are stored in flash.

contents.name: num_samples
contents.description: Number of input samples collected so far.

contents.name: stream_samples
contents.description: When set to `N`, will stream `N` samples as `current_sample` reading.
